actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require certain areas to be designated as class III for purposes of the provisions of that Act relating to nondegradation of air quality, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to designate any area in excess of 5,000 acres and zoned or otherwise officially designated by State and local authorities for industrial use, as a class III area for purposes of provisions relating to nondegradation of air quality.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require certain areas to be designated as class III for purposes of the provisions of that Act relating to nondegradation of air quality, and for other purposes.
